item.title: Cloud Academy - Week 1 blog
item.description: Cloud Service Types IAAS - Infrastructure as a Service - Compute, storage etc (EC2, S3) - Base infrastructure that you can build whatever you want on. PAAS - Platform as a Service - The underlying infrastructure is looked after by the service provider (hardware and OS), meaning you can focus on the service/app you are building/deploying (ex: Elastic Beanstalk, Lambda) SAAS - Software as a Service - Elastic, Adobe Photoshop, AI images, M365, Teams etc
